name: Balls Dodge
description:
Welcome to Balls Dodge!An endless yet funny game. [HOW TO PLAY]

• Use the arrows to dodge all obstacles
• Tap on the middle to jump
• Collect gems & powerups

[FEATURES]

• Unlockable skins
• Free gems to collect
• Second chance (Revive)
• Shield
• Tiny size
• Playground shrinking
• Ultimate comeback
